resources.string: 1. Who listens the least in class ?
2. Who will take Software Architecture next year ?
3. Who is most likely to arrive late ?
4. Who is most likely to eat during class ?
5. Who most often stayed after class to talk with the teacher ?
😵 0/5! Ouch… Are you sure you\'re even part of the group? 😂
😬 1/5! Hmm… Looks like you kinda missed out on those group convos!
🤔 2/5! You know us a little, but there are some memory gaps 👀
😎 3/5! Not bad! You know us pretty well, but there are still secrets to uncover 😉
🔥 4/5! Woah, almost a bestie gossip expert! You\'re this close to the Supreme Bestie title 💖
🏆 5/5! AMAZING! You’re definitely the official bestie — you know everything! 😍
🤨 Unknown score… Will the besties approve this result? 👀
